name: DUNGEON RACER
description:
Dungeon crawling racing game, drift around a dungeon while gathering that precious gold!

You'll have to shoot your enemies and conserve your precious fuel to reach the end of the game (If you can).

Keys:

- Up arrow key to accelerate
- Down arrow key to reverse
- Right and left arrow keys to turn your car

- Z key to shoot your front machinegun

- X key to shoot your sideways shotguns

Art:  EvilTomato

Code:  ZargarTheBarbar

SFX: ZargarTheBarbar

Music:  80's SuperSpeed by Gustav Eriksson "_Pengus" purchased on AudioJungle
